channel.title: Comments on: Is Fragmentation Hurting Android?

item.title: By: Charles McKeever
item.dc:creator: Charles McKeever
item.description: I wonder how many Android developers actually develop for more than one form factor?
item.content:encoded: I wonder how many Android developers actually develop for more than one form factor?

item.title: By: Charles McKeever
item.dc:creator: Charles McKeever
item.description:
This topic spurred quite a bit of discussion on Google+. Be sure to check out the discussion there as well. Feel free to add your opinion to the conversation.
